response.original_title: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call - New Orleans
response.overview: Terrence McDonagh is a New Orleans Police sergeant, who receives a medal and a promotion to lieutenant for heroism during Hurricane Katrina. Due to his heroic act, McDonagh injures his back and becomes addicted to prescription pain medication. He then finds himself involved with a drug dealer who is suspected of murdering a family of African immigrants.
response.tagline: The only criminal he can't catch is himself.
response.title: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call - New Orleans
